hed: Week in Fashion: See Gigi Hadid, Kendall Jenner, and Kristen Stewart Go from Day to Night
dek:
One day, two killer ensembles. This week, __Gigi Hadid__, __Kendall Jenner__ and __Kristen Stewart__ had us seeing double 
with not one, but two inimitable outfits in a single day. Other sartorial overachievers included __Diane Kruger__, __Amber Heard__, and more giving us an impressive array of day to evening transformations possible. Click through to see how these fashion chameleons work around-the-clock.

items.caption:
__KENDALL JENNER__

We love Kendall's collegiate-chic turtleneck almost as much we love the Nike sneaks that carried her into the U.S. Open night session.
items.credit: Left, © Corbis; Right, from Getty Images.

items.caption:
__KRISTEN STEWART__ 

From casual cushion couture to a regal spellbinding metallic lace gown, these are two sides to Kristen that we wouldn't have in any other way.

__DIANE KRUGER__ 

Two days after stepping ashore in a chic and jaunty all-black getup at the Venice Film Festival, Diane stole the red carpet in a next-level Oscar de la Renta gown.

__AMBER HEARD__

Overhead: Amber shined brighter than the Venice sun in drapey Zimmerman, then positively slayed in Alexander McQueen on the red carpet.

__JULIETTE BINOCHE__

Another all-black look for a day movie premiere and a dress and pump that seem like long lost soulmates.  As for the night, we're no [strangers](https://www.google.com/search?q=deep%20v%20vanity%20fair&oq=deep%20v%20vanity%20fair&aqs=chrome..69i57j0l3.3326j0j9&sourceid=chrome&es_sm=119&ie=UTF-8) to v-neck's and this stellar Armani Privé gown takes the night away.

__GIGI HADID__

Gigi embarked on a study in reds, hitting the town in a laid-back romper, then shining on the red carpet in a reflective Tommy Hilfiger frock.
items.credit: Left, from Getty Images; Right, from PatrickMcMullan.com.

items.caption:
__JESSICA ALBA__

The honest (*all pun intended*) winner of fashion multitasking this week, Jessica, transitioned effortlessly between lovely and lacey Jonathan Saunders one day, and preppy pink Roksanda, cool-girl stripes and slides, and Thakoon the next.
